name: copy
text:
- name: http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/copy_module.html
  copy:
    src: /srv/myfiles/foo.conf
    dest: /etc/foo.conf
    owner: foo
    group: foo
    mode: 0644

name: syncronize
text:
- name: http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/synchronize_module.html
  synchronize:
    mode: pull    src: rsync://somehost.com/path/
    dest: /some/absolute/path/

name: template
text:
- name: http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/template_module.html
  template:
    src: /mytemplates/foo.j2
    dest: /etc/file.conf
    owner: bin
    group: wheel
    mode: 0644

name: unarchive
text:
- name: http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/unarchive_module.html
  unarchive:
    src: foo.tgz
    dest: /usr/local/bin
    remote_src: yes

name: npm
text:
- name: http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/npm_module.html
  npm:
    name: coffee-script
    version: '1.6.1'
    state: absent
    global: yes
    path: /app/location
